column4: did you run the system testing to see if the system will run compiz

I love it for years. I am using it in two dual screen computer setups. It is a the perfect solution for a dual screen setup.
It is definitly worth a try. I don't use the ecomorph compiz version. Just clean good e17 ;)
TAke yourself some time to explore e17. It is really complex for configuration, as you can almost do anything...
YOu can run your normal ubuntu 10.04 install. You only need to install the WindoMAnager e17. There are different ways to do that.
VCoolio Probalby as VCoolio I tell you. Try e17 without ecomorph first. ;)

makes me use my brain. makes me remeber all the programing classes I had.
